name: BAMG2023
description:
In the game, the player initially runs a Grade C club, but the player's ability value is not high. They pass their own management, upgrade to the Grade A league, and win the championship.

If your team goes bankrupt at the end of the year, the game is over.

Because I don't have a strong artistic background and don't know how to create many things myself, the thing I created is not very attractive, and its gameplay is not very strong. It can even be said to be shoddy. So if you are willing to play, play it, and don't scold if you don't play. I don't want to waste so much effort and end up getting scolded.

Welcome to “BGMG2023” - a strategic and challenging basketball manager simulation game! In this game, you will assume the role of a true basketball team general manager, overseeing the entire team, building it from scratch and leading them to win the championship.

As the general manager of “BGMG2023,” you need to consider many factors, such as player recruitment, training, trading, tactical strategy, and team budget, etc. You need to fully consider the strengths of your own team and your opponents, analyze the game, and utilize various skills and strategies to defeat your opponent and win the game.

In “BGMG2023,” each player is an independent entity with their own attributes and abilities. You can arrange tactics reasonably according to each player’s characteristics and improve player skills through the coach system to further enhance team strength.

" BGMG2023” uses real player images, a dynamic rating system, and vivid game scenes, allowing you to experience the strategy, teamwork, and innovative thinking behind basketball competition.

Now, come and download “BGMG2023” and start your professional basketball journey, become a great basketball manager!

In the later stage, I gradually optimized the art and improved some gameplay. With everyone's feedback, I really can't come up with any ideas.
